body: You know, I just watched Jacob Geller’s: The Horror of Universal Paperclips and Space Engine, and The Quiet Sadness of Mario Galaxy… and I realize that the only thing that consistently distracts me from how insignificant I am to the universe, or how even insignificant the universe is to death itself is by jacking off to hentai or laughing at us making fun of anything. Like, the first thing we did when scientists showed us the FIRST PHOTO OF A BLACKHOLE, a thing that’s possibly the MOST POWERFUL THING IN THE UNIVERSE, WITH INFINITE GRAVITY THAT MAKES LIGHT ITSELF NOT BE FAST ENOUGH TO ESCAPE… first thing we did is turned it into a hot anime girl… and I kinda fucking love humanity for that reason. Anyway, that’s all, go back to fapping and have a good day/night. :D
If I was a man🤤 the thought of fucking one of these she-male lolis r so hot
